p:
Agilent mouse 4 × 44 k two-color microarrays can hybridize up to 30,175 distinct transcripts, out of which 22,657 are probed by single spots. However, other genes are probed by more spots. The most redundantly probed (by 13 spots) are: Abcc5, Cpne4, Csf1, Esr1, Mapk1, Oprm1, P2rx3, Socs2. Therefore, we average the expression level of each gene first on biological replicas for the same spot and then over all spots probing redundantly the same gene.
1
